attributes.action: Nationalise our gas & electric supply industry
attributes.additional_details: I like many parents cannot simply afford the extortionate prices that these gas companies are charging and we feel the only way to protect our interests for now and especially for our children is to Nationalise the gas and electric supply Industry to the great British public this will go someway to safeguarding and protecting the interest of the great British public now and into the future
attributes.background: We Petition with our support that the Government take full public control over the gas and electric supply industry on behalf of the British public especially with regards to the pricing of our gas and electricity, by doing so removing profiteering for the benefit of high tax, shareholders ect

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608056
